description: Discover the groundbreaking convergence of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and digital twins, technologies transforming ownership, commerce, and identity in digital and physical spaces. Explore applications in real estate, fashion, smart cities, and more, alongside challenges and future prospects.
keywords: NFTs, digital twins, technology, blockchain, virtual reality, digital assets, smart cities, supply chain, metaverse
title: The Convergence of NFT and Digital Twins: Shaping the Future of Technology
